masterScript.transcript: Is it possible to fix a database error in 6 minutes?

an error with our create comment function in the test.

masterScript.transcript: And after all changes, I move the console log down at the bottom and run the test. We can see the console log is logging out to the terminal, so even though there's a new error, we know that we have fixed the old one and can move on to the next step of our program.

masterScript.transcript: Right, so that was 7 minutes and 13 seconds. That was just a small error that we fixed today, but if you want to see more into how to build an application and launching it, make sure to give me a follow so I have more time to work on my stop. See you tomorrow.
